title: Sales Leaders
subtitle: speed, consistency, and control across revenue execution

xMatixPlatform.title: For Sales Leaders
xMatixPlatform.description1: Sales leaders are accountable for predictable revenue, deal velocity, and customer experience. Yet execution often breaks between CRM, pricing, fulfilment, and finance systems, slowing deals and increasing risk.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix provides a single execution layer that connects the entire sales lifecycle, enabling sales teams to move faster while maintaining governance and visibility.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most sales organisations rely on CRM systems to manage opportunities, but execution slows once a deal moves beyond the pipeline. Disconnected systems and manual handoffs create delays, errors, and poor forecasting accuracy.

ecosystem.title: CRM-Centric Processes
ecosystem.description: Track leads and opportunities but lack control over pricing, approvals, fulfilment, and post-sale execution.

ecosystem.title: Manual Approvals & Escalations
ecosystem.description: Rely on emails and spreadsheets for deal approvals, discounting, and exception handling.

ecosystem.title: Disconnected Fulfilment & Finance
ecosystem.description: Create gaps between selling, delivery, invoicing, and collections, delaying revenue realisation.

ecosystem.title: Limited Deal Visibility
ecosystem.description: Provide pipeline views without real-time insight into deal risk, execution status, or downstream impact.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer for sales operations, unifying lead management, pricing, approvals, order execution, and revenue recognition into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it ensures sales execution is fast, policy-driven, and fully visible from first contact to cash.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}sales teams{{/highlight}} execute on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Sales execution runs on a shared operational layer, enabling faster deal cycles, consistent governance, and predictable outcomes.

features.title: Lead & Opportunity Management
features.description: Manage leads and opportunities with shared customer, pricing, and policy context across teams.

features.title: Pricing, Quoting & Approvals
features.description: Apply pricing rules, discount thresholds, and approvals automatically within governed workflows.

features.title: Order & Fulfilment Execution
features.description: Convert deals into executable orders with real-time visibility into inventory, delivery, and service readiness.

features.title: Billing & Revenue Visibility
features.description: Track invoicing, collections, and deal completion with end-to-end visibility and accountability.

requestADemo.heading: See how sales teams execute on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix helps sales leaders close deals faster, reduce friction, and execute revenue on a single platform.
